00031 
00032 // absolute precedence (~operand part)
00033 #define PREC_MAXIMUM -10
00034 
00035 
00036 #define PREC_OP_LOGICALNOT -3           /* !  */
00037 #define PREC_OP_BITWISENOT -2           /* ~  */
00038 #define PREC_OP_NEGATE -1               /* -  */
00039 // high precedence
00040 #define PREC_OP_BITWISEAND 0            /* &  */
00041 #define PREC_OP_BITWISEOR 1             /* |  */
00042 #define PREC_OP_BITWISEXOR 2            /* ^  */
00043 
00044 #define PREC_OP_SHIFTRIGHT 3            /* >> */
00045 #define PREC_OP_SHIFTLEFT 3             /* << */
00046 
00047 #define PREC_OP_MULTIPLICATION 5        /* *  */
00048 #define PREC_OP_DIVISION 5              /* /  */
00049 #define PREC_OP_MODULUS 5               /* %  */
00050 
00051 #define PREC_OP_SUM 8                   /* +  */
00052 #define PREC_OP_SUBTRACTION 8           /* -  */
00053 
00054 #define PREC_OP_GREATERTHAN 11          /* >  */ /* Case sensitive (normal for numbers) */
00055 #define PREC_OP_LOWERTHAN 11            /* <  */ /* Case sensitive (normal for numbers) */
00056 
00057 #define PREC_OP_EQUALTO 12              /* == */ /* Case sensitive comparison for strings or normal comp.fr numbers */
00058 
00059 #define PREC_OP_GREATEROREQUALTO 14     /* >= */ /* Case sensitive (normal for numbers) */
00060 #define PREC_OP_LOWEROREQUALTO 14       /* <= */ /* Case sensitive (normal for numbers) */
00061 
00062 #define PREC_OP_NOTEQUALTO 15           /* != */ /* Case sensitive (normal for numbers) */
00063 
00064 #define PREC_OP_AND 16                  /* && */
00065 #define PREC_OP_OR 17                   /* || */
00066 #define PREC_OP_XOR 18                  /* ^^ */
00067 // low precedence
00068 
00069 
00070 class KVIRC_API KviKvsTreeNodeExpression : public KviKvsTreeNodeData
00071 {
00072         // this class is never instantiated
00073 public:
00074         KviKvsTreeNodeExpression(const QChar * pLocation);
00075         ~KviKvsTreeNodeExpression();
00076 protected:
00077         KviKvsTreeNodeExpression * m_pParentExpression;
00078 public:
00079         virtual void contextDescription(QString &szBuffer);
00080         virtual void dump(const char * prefix);
00081         virtual int precedence();
00082         virtual KviKvsTreeNodeExpression * left();
00083         virtual KviKvsTreeNodeExpression * right();
00084         virtual void setLeft(KviKvsTreeNodeExpression * pLeft);
00085         virtual void setRight(KviKvsTreeNodeExpression * pRight);
00086         virtual int firstBinaryOperator();
00087         KviKvsTreeNodeExpression * parentExpression(){ return m_pParentExpression; };
00088         void setParentExpression(KviKvsTreeNodeExpression * pParent){ m_pParentExpression = pParent; };
00089         virtual KviKvsTreeNodeExpression * parentWithPrecedenceLowerThan(int iPrec);
00090 };

00181 class KVIRC_API KviKvsTreeNodeExpressionBinaryOperator : public KviKvsTreeNodeExpressionOperator
00182 {
00183 public:
00184         KviKvsTreeNodeExpressionBinaryOperator(const QChar * pLocation);
00185         ~KviKvsTreeNodeExpressionBinaryOperator();
00186 protected:
00187         KviKvsTreeNodeExpression * m_pLeft;  // can be zero only during parsing (and thus when deleting)
00188         KviKvsTreeNodeExpression * m_pRight; // can be zero only during parsing (and thus when deleting)
00189         KviKvsNumber               m_nLeft;  // buffer used to evaluate numeric operands
00190         KviKvsNumber               m_nRight; // buffer used to evaluate numeric operands
00191 public:
00192         virtual KviKvsTreeNodeExpression * left();
00193         virtual KviKvsTreeNodeExpression * right();
00194         void setLeft(KviKvsTreeNodeExpression * pLeft);
00195         void setRight(KviKvsTreeNodeExpression * pRight);
00196         virtual int firstBinaryOperator();
00197 public:
00198         void dumpOperands(const char * prefix);
00199         virtual void contextDescription(QString &szBuffer);
00200         virtual void dump(const char * prefix);
00201 protected:
00202         bool evaluateOperands(KviKvsRunTimeContext * c);
00203 };

00205 #define DECLARE_BINARY_OPERATOR(__name) \
00206         class KVIRC_API __name : public KviKvsTreeNodeExpressionBinaryOperator \
00207         { \
00208         public: \
00209                 __name(const QChar * pLocation); \
00210                 ~__name(); \
00211         public: \
00212                 virtual void contextDescription(QString &szBuffer); \
00213                 virtual void dump(const char * prefix); \
00214                 virtual bool evaluateReadOnly(KviKvsRunTimeContext * c,KviKvsVariant * pResult); \
00215                 virtual int precedence(); \
00216         }
